content.question: Have you changed your name since you got married?
content.weddingDayName: The court needs to know if you changed your name when you got married, or if you’ve changed it since.
content.howChangeName: How did you change your name?
content.postACopy: You’ll need to send a copy to the court. You can upload a digital photo or scan at the end of this application or you can send it by post.
content.detailsTitle: Provide details of how you changed your name
content.detailsDocuments: You’ll need to send the document proving you changed your name to the court. You can upload a digital photo or scan at the end of this application or you can send it by post. If you don’t have any documents showing how you changed your name, explain why here.

content.question: A ydych chi wedi newid eich enw ers ichi briodi?
content.weddingDayName: Mae’r llys angen gwybod a wnaethoch newid eich enw ar ôl priodi, neu a ydych wedi ei newid ers hynny.
content.howChangeName: Sut wnaethoch chi newid eich enw?
content.deedPoll: Gweithred newid enw neu ddatganiad statudol
content.postACopy: Bydd angen ichi anfon copi i’r llys. Gallwch lwytho llun digidol neu lun wedi ei sganio ar derfyn y cais hwn neu gallwch anfon llun drwy’r post.
content.detailsTitle: Darparwch fanylion sy’n dangos sut wnaethoch chi newid eich enw
content.detailsDocuments: Bydd angen ichi anfon y ddogfen sy’n profi eich bod wedi newid eich enw i’r llys. Gallwch lwytho llun digidol neu lun wedi ei sganio ar derfyn y cais hwn neu gallwch anfon llun drwy’r post. Os nad oes gennych ddogfen sy’n egluro sut y gwnaethoch newid eich enw, eglurwch hynny yma.
